sentence: Gaza's  health  ministry  has  said  Israel's  assault  has  killed  more  than  25,000  Palestinians,  the  majority  of  which  are  women  and  children.
It  has  been  a  reaction  to  the  Oct.  7  attack  in  Israel  in  which  Hamas  militants  killed  about  1,200  people  and  kidnapped  roughly  250  others.
